title: Bart De Wever - Wikipedia
snippet: Bart Albert Liliane De Wever (Dutch: [ˈbɑrt də ˈʋeːvər]; born 21 December 1970) is a Belgian author, historian and politician who has served as the Prime Minister of Belgium since February 2025. From 2004 to 2025, De Wever had been the leader of the New Flemish Alliance (N-VA), a political ...

title: Belgium to form government after seven months of negotiations | Belgium | The Guardian
snippet: Five Belgian parties struck a coalition deal on Friday to form a new government headed by the Flemish conservative Bart De Wever, after more than seven months of tortuous negotiations.

title: Flemish nationalist Bart De Wever sworn in as Belgian prime minister | Euronews
snippet: Flemish nationalist Bart De Wever has been sworn in as the country's new prime minister following months of painstaking negotiations to form a coalition that moves the country further to the right.

title: New Belgian PM wants to cool EU 'regulatory fervour', defend Europe within NATO | Reuters
snippet: At home, De Wever outlined plans to streamline state finances to save 23 billion euros, while increasing defence spending to 2% of GDP, in line with NATO commitments. In December 2024, Belgium received an EU extension to present its budget in ...
